verbs.description: “ [ARG0: I] [V: think] [ARG1: most Americans would like to see the Trump administration do better in situations like this] . ”
“ I think most Americans [V: would] like to see the Trump administration do better in situations like this . ”
“ I think [ARG0: most Americans] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: like] [ARG1: to see the Trump administration do better in situations like this] . ”
“ I think [ARG0: most Americans] would like to [V: see] [ARG1: the Trump administration do better in situations like this] . ”
“ I think most Americans would like to see [ARG0: the Trump administration] [V: do] [ARGM-MNR: better] [ARGM-LOC: in situations like this] . ”
